seo.title: Scaling GSA's 10x Program | 10x.GSA.gov
seo.description: View of Will Cahoe, 10x project coordinator, discussing 10x's approach to small scale investment and how they've applied the lessons of the private sector.

title: Scaling GSA's 10x program
excerpt: View of Will Cahoe, 10x project coordinator, discussing 10x's approach to small scale investment and how they've applied the lessons of the private sector.

sections.body:
Will Cahoe, 10x project coordinator at the General Services Administration (GSA) discusses 10x’s approach to small scale tech investments, and how they are applying the lessons of the private sector to government technology.

Read more about **[10x’s unique approach at Government Matters](https://govmatters.tv/scaling-gsas-10x-program/).**
